category: Herbs that Transform Phlegm and Stop Coughing

action.primary: Resolves Phlegm, dissipates nodules and reduces masses

indications: Goiter (it can be used alone as a tincture)
Toxic swellings, scrofula, swollen and painful throat and animal bites (topical)
Only in emergency for snake bite (does not replace anti-venom)
Many types of cancers, especially esophageal, Stomach, uterine and Colon

action.primary: Cools the Blood and stops bleeding

indications: Coughs associated with acute and chronic bronchitis

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with ulcerated abscesses.
Contraindicated for those with pre-existing Liver disorders such as hepatitis or cirrhosis.
It may cause nausea, dry mouth, abdominal pain and vomiting.
Long term use of high doses may cause liver damage and jaundice.
Overdose may cause a burning sensation in the mouth, tongue and pharynx, salivation, diarrhea and contracted pupils.

useCases: Esophageal, stomach, rectal, and thyroid cancers.
Cough due to acute or chronic bronchitis.

notes: This herb resolves Shao Yin Heat to remove throat Bi.
This herb can be applied topically for psoriasis and cervical dysplasia.
This herb can be used alone as a medicinal tincture for goiter.
It can be used in its fresh form as a paste for snake bites. Combine with other herbs depending on the symptoms.
This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
When ground with water and ingested or applied topically, this herb has shown a curative effect on various malignant sores, swellings, fistulas, pharyngitis and snake and dog bites.
It has has shown a curative effect on esophageal cancer.
For long-term goiter and Qi Stagnation, mix with wine and drink frequently.
When ground and taken with water or applied topically, this herb treats malignant sores, swellings, fistula, pharyngitis, and snake and dog bites.
Made into a wine, this herb treats goiter due to Qi Stagnation.
Long-term goiter patients should drink the wine frequently in order to keep the fragrance in the body.
